title: Reusable Bamboo Coffee Cup
description: Eco-friendly bamboo fiber coffee cup with silicone lid and sleeve. Durable, reusable, and biodegradable.

title: Beeswax Food Wraps (Set of 3)
description: Reusable beeswax wraps to replace plastic wrap. Washable, breathable, and compostable.

title: Coconut Bowl Set
description: Handmade bowls crafted from reclaimed coconut shells. Perfect for smoothies and salads.

title: Eco Laundry Detergent Sheets
description: Plastic-free laundry detergent sheets. Lightweight, effective, and biodegradable.

title: Biodegradable Trash Bags
description: Compostable trash bags made from plant-based materials. Strong and leak-proof.

title: Bamboo Toothbrush (Pack of 4)
description: Biodegradable bamboo toothbrushes with BPA-free bristles. Eco-friendly alternative to plastic.

title: Natural Loofah Sponge
description: Zero-waste exfoliating bath sponge made from dried loofah plants.

title: Compostable Phone Case
description: Plant-based biodegradable phone case. Slim, durable, and eco-friendly.

title: Organic Cotton Tote Bag
description: Strong and stylish tote bag made from 100% organic cotton. Perfect for grocery shopping and everyday use.

title: Organic Cotton T-Shirt
description: Soft, breathable T-shirt made from certified organic cotton. Sustainable fashion choice.

title: Bamboo Sunglasses
description: Stylish sunglasses with bamboo frames and polarized lenses. Lightweight and eco-conscious.

title: Hemp Backpack
description: Durable backpack made from natural hemp fiber. Sustainable and stylish.

title: Stainless Steel Water Bottle
description: Reusable insulated water bottle, keeps drinks cold for 24h and hot for 12h. Zero plastic waste.

title: Solar Powered Lantern
description: Portable lantern powered by solar energy. Ideal for camping or home emergency use.

title: Reusable Produce Bags (Set of 5)
description: Mesh cotton produce bags to replace single-use plastic bags. Washable and durable.

title: Eco-Friendly Yoga Mat
description: Non-toxic, biodegradable yoga mat made from natural tree rubber.

title: Solar Power Bank
description: Portable charger powered by solar energy. Dual USB ports for charging devices.

title: Recycled Notebook
description: Notebook made from 100% recycled paper with eco-friendly ink printing.

title: Eco Wooden Cutlery Set
description: Reusable cutlery set made from sustainably sourced wood. Comes with cotton pouch.

title: Recycled Glass Water Pitcher
description: Handmade pitcher crafted from recycled glass. Elegant and eco-conscious tableware.
